setting.name: slave_clock_id
setting.description: ID for PIC embedded slave clock

setting.name: protocol_code
setting.description: Protocol codes for slave clock communication

setting.name: digit_file_img_prefix
setting.description: Image files for displaying the digit 0 - 9. suffix is default as _00 to _09

setting.name: event_trigger
setting.description: Executable file (full path file name) that when event is trigger.

setting.name: bool_24h
setting.description: set the clock displayed as 12 (AM/PM) or 24 hour format
